Sentence (Montserrat Creole): Mi bin go a schuil yistide.
Dem a cook food pan di faya.
If mi did know, mi wouldn bin go.
Mi ago visit mi modda later.
She always a sing when she happy.
Di book dem don read arready.
Mi shudda buy dat dress.
Im waan fi go but im cyaan.
Mi mek di cake wid coconut an sugar.
Nobady neva see im yestide.
Ow u deh? Mi long time no see yo!
Mi need fi buy some ting from di shop.
Dem tell mi say rain ago fall later.
A wah yo do yestide?
Mi cyaan believe di price dem raise so much!
Mi hear say dem a go build new road.
Mi cyaan find mi key, yo see dem?
Mi soon reach, hol on likkle bit.
Mi haffi lef now, cyaan late fi wuk.
Di food taste real good!
Mi just buy a new phone, it really fast!
Wi ago meet pan Zoom fi di meeting.
Mi cyaan decide if mi waan go cinema or stay home.
Di restaurant sell di best jerk chicken in town.
Mi cousin live a Canada now, im love di cold.
Wi deh chat bout di football match last night.
Mi soon check mi email an sen di response.
Mi haffi tek di train to wuk every morning.
Mi likkle sister love listen to reggae music.
Mi plan fi travel a London next year.
Good morning, mi wud like fi schedule an appointment.
Di company a look fi new employees.
Di contract state di terms an conditions clearly.
Di doctor recommend more exercise fi good health.
Di lawyer a review di case carefully.
Wi appreciate yo business an support.
Please ensure di documents dem sign properly.
Customer service a assist clients all di time.
Di government announce new policies fi tourism.
Financial stability a key fi future success.
One one cocoa full basket.
Time longer dan rope.
Mi cyaan put all mi egg in one basket.
All fish have dem bone.
Mi granny always say, 'Wah sweet nanny goat a go run im belly.'
Di pot cyaan call di kettle black.
When trouble tek yuh, pickney clothes fit yuh.
Monkey know which tree fi climb.
Mi nuh waan jump outta frying pan into fire.
Empty barrel mek di most noise.
Wah yo name? - Mi name a Junior.
Weh yo live? - Mi live a St. John's.
Wah time it deh now? - It almost midday.
Yo eat already? - No, mi still hungry.
Yo like di movie? - Yes, it did real nice.
How much fi dis? - It cost twenty dollar.
When yo ago lef? - Mi ago lef later today.
Why yo late? - Traffic did bad this morning.
Weh mi shoes deh? - Check under di bed.
Who call mi? - It sound like it was Mark.
Come yah an look pon dis.
Gi mi di salt please.
Tun off di light before yo lef.
Wait yah, mi soon come.
Bring di paper come gi mi.
Put di food pan di table.
Write yo name pan di paper.
Lef di door open fi di breeze.
Hol di bag tight, it heavy.
Mi need yo help wid dis.
Mi go Montserrat last year fi carnival.
John an Mary deh yah wid wi.
Di Prime Minister address di nation yestide.
Mi teacher name Miss James.
Wi live near Soufrière Hills.
Di airport at Gerald’s look nice.
Mi birthday deh pan di 15th of August.
Dem plan fi visit St. Kitts next month.
Mi uncle wuk a Bank of Montserrat.
Mi fada did know di Queen in im young days.
Mi love how di weather nice today!
Mi vex say mi miss di bus.
Mi feel real tired afta di long day.
Di food so good, mi wah eat more.
Mi cyaan believe mi lose mi phone!
Mi so happy fi see mi friend again.
Mi no like how dem change di rules.
Di movie did boring, mi nearly sleep.
Mi excited fi mi trip next week!
Mi sad say di party done already.
Mi neva go pan di trip, mi did busy.
Mi did busy so mi neva mek di trip.
Di food taste sweet!
Di food real nice, mi love it!
Mi cyaan find mi book.
Mi a look fi mi book but mi nuh see it.
It deh pan di table.
Di table have it pan top.
Mi soon reach, hol tight.
Mi a come soon, wait likkle.
